The novel is filled with lessons advocating the importance of overcoming adversity, rejecting stereotypes, channeling emotions and displaying self-confidence. #EPOCA is on-sale today! Get your copy now: https://t.co/gxaedifgcZ #GranityStudios

#EPOCA: The Tree of Ecof is the inspiring tale of two talented and diverse young track and field athletes who must ‘race’ to find their inner magic and #grana in order to save their classmates (and each other) from evil forces.

This novel holds a special place of importance for me because it was the first @Granity story I started crafting while still playing in the NBA. The audiobook is read by Phylicia Rashad, who has been an inspiration to me since I was a kid. https://t.co/0YEHCEh7NV
their inner magic and #grana. EPOCA is available Nov. 12 wherever you buy or listen to books. Click the link below to pre-order! https://t.co/gxaedifgcZ

I created @Granity Studios as a way of teaching valuable life lessons to the next generation. Our stories represent a competitive mindset about being the best at what you do. The principles built within #EPOCA inspire, motivate, and encourage those who are looking to harness https://t.co/5cZocqcEc2

Don’t miss #ThePunies season two finale! This podcast teaches kids the importance of learning through sports. The entire second season is available wherever you listen to podcasts! https://t.co/W1VRKDciMK #GranityStudios https://t.co/cweISo2Q7E

to work together to overcome evil forces. EPOCA is a book that I hope challenges imaginations and really gets kids thinking. Click the link in our bio to pre-order. https://t.co/uyezAiOUAJ #GranityStudios

Introducing our next @Granity chapter, #EPOCA: The Tree of Ecrof. This track & field story is about two kids, Pretia and Rovi, who come from different walks of life and meet at an elite sports school. They need to use their own emotional magic – called #GRANA – https://t.co/sO4YxMME6u
one of you that follows and purchases will get a personal video message from me with your purchase!

Launching my new LIVE channel on TalkShopLive! Join me live on Friday, October 25th at 11am PT to chat about my new book Epoca: The Tree of Ecrof!  Follow my channel here https://t.co/TurpL2OlHO. Random copies sold during my live will be signed! https://t.co/poeK2VisI8

And for the record my daughter wears #2 because @sydneyleroux is her favorite athlete #soccer
#facts

@Chron_MattYoung Doing a dance to miss the game isn’t a bad thing. That’s not what I was saying. I was just giving context as to why she wasn’t in the picture. All my girls play/played diff sports. It’s all good and For the record I followed their lead on not smiling. They HATED those trophies

@joshfortunatus sorry if it came across as a slight, trust me it wasn’t. I was just giving the reason for her not being in the pic. They chose not to smile for the pic I actually followed their lead. Our team has become family and this includes the 7th player
@Aura_HD 🤷🏽‍♂️ some kids hate loosing bro and that’s ok. They have worked hard to improve because of it.

@Redd_Vain Nah fam I was just explaining why she wasn’t in the pic. Most of my kids on the team played and still play other sports including my daughter so it’s all love. Don’t misunderstand the message.

Catch me on #Kimmel TONIGHT! Had fun discussing @Granity’s latest projects including our newest book, #LegacyandtheQueen, which is about a young tennis phenom and the scripted family friendly podcast series #ThePunies. Tune-in tonight at 11:35 ET to watch! #ABC #GranityStudios https://t.co/Zj4LpZTtLO
Thank you to each and every one who played a part in this. #LegacyAndTheQueen is out now! Link to order is in bio. 🙌🏾🎾 #GameSetMagic

We all want our kids to be the best version of themselves and dream as big as they can to reach their highest potential. But chasing a dream takes a lot of courage. That’s what I want kids to learn by reading our novels.

Legacy and the Queen will teach kids lessons in perseverance, commitment, hard work, compassion, and empathy. And the lessons built within the story are the same disciplines and prinples that I try to instill in my daughters everyday.

So excited for this project and for you all to experience the magical journey of #LegacyandtheQueen. As kids get older, we hope they’ll start to understand the meanings and messages found in reading. And sports stories can serve as the greatest metaphors for life. https://t.co/QRZBlykasz

Thanks to @GMA for having me on to discuss our newest @Granity middle grade novel #LegacyAndTheQueen, the importance of teaching kids how to deal with emotions and how my girls are my inspiration. https://t.co/juqENVbiOO
